titleStmt.title: The unfortunate happy lady a true history / by Mrs. A. Behn.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

notesStmt.note: This item is identified on film and in reel guide as B1773A (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.); it is now included as part of Wing (2nd ed.) B1711A.
